person.content:

| --- |
| it (refers to the city) |

| --- |
| it (refers to the city) |

In this paragraph, the only "Person" entity is the pronoun "it," which refers to the city. The term "Euronotes" is a financial instrument and not a person. Similarly, "June" is a month and not a person.
